column2: ENGLISH
I hereby knight you as ser [Root.GetFirstName]\nSigned,\n[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
It is an honor

Greetings [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I hereby grant your request for promotion.
Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
It is an honor.
Face a Famous Bandit
Face a Famous Bandit
Find and defeat a famous bandit that has been plaguing the countryside
Find and defeat a famous bandit
My dear brother, a vile bandit has been terrorizing the peasants. I would charge you with finding and dispatching them. \nWill you accept this duty?
The possible location of the bandit base of operation has been identified to a reduced area but the specific position eludes us. How will you search for the necessary information?
I will ask the villagers in the area
I will personally search for the base
I will set an ambush for the bandits
I will threaten known collaborators of the bandits
You have succeeded in identifying the bandit base, how will you prepare for the attack?
You have failed to find the bandit base and their head has offered a defiant challenge. You will both meet next week for a duel, how will you prepare?
I will spar with members of my guard
I will pray to God for guidance and protection
I will coat my weapon in a deadly poison
I will train my squire to assist me
As you head to your rendezvous with the bandit leader you must choose how you shall fight him
Honorably of course!
There's no harm in using a trick or two...
I will send my squire to tire him out
I will train my squire to assist me
The duel goes spectacularly in your favor as you dispatch the bandit leader without recieving a scratch. The other outlaws disperse and won't trouble the countryside anymore.
The duel is hard fought and you end up with painful injuries. Nonetheless, the other outlaws disperse and won't trouble the countryside anymore.

The duel is hard fought and you end up with painful injuries, the bandit leader laughs as your squire helps you away. The newly emboldened outlaws break away and will continue to trouble the countryside for years to come.
Sweet victory!
Damn them!
Slay a Ferocious Beast
Slay a Ferocious Beast
Find and defeat a ferocious beast that has been plaguing the countryside
Find and defeat a ferocious beast
My dear brother, a terrible [Root.GetBeast] has been terrorizing the peasants. I would charge you with finding and dispatching it. \nWill you accept this duty?
The beast is elusive and no-one has yet found its lair, how will go about searching for it?
I will carefully follow its tracks
I will use some bait to lure it and then follow it
I will use some bait to poison it and then follow the weakened [Root.GetBeast]
I will set a trap to injure it and then follow the weakened [Root.GetBeast]
Your strategy pays off and you find yourself at its lair. You see it sniff the air, realizing something is wrong, how will you start your attack?
Your strategy fails you and you cannot find the creature. Suddenly, you turn around as a monstrous [Root.GetBeast] falls upon you! How will you defend yourself?
Attack from a distance
Attack with your sword
Attack with your spear
Send your squire to tire it
Your attack works as the beast reels from its injuries and hesitates before its next move. What will be your final strategy?
Your attack fails you and you find yourself beaten back and in danger. The [Root.GetBeast] comes for you full of fury, what will you do to save yourself?
Attack from a distance
Attack with your sword
Attack with your spear
Send your squire to distract it
The beast is no match for you, you expertly find its weakeness and strike fatally. You return to your castle with a magnificent trophy to add to your collection.

The beast is a valiant opponent, you trade blows and both end up with painful injuries. Dancing around, you finally catch it off guard and manage to place a fatal attack. You return to your castle with a magnificent trophy to add to your collection.
The beast is a valiant opponent, you trade blows and both end up with painful injuries. You fear for your life and manage to get away just in time as the [Root.GetBeast] roars defiantly at you
You'll fit nicely above the fireplace
Get me away from that thing!
Escort a Group of Pilgrims
Escort a Group of Pilgrims
Escort and assist a group of pilgrims travelling through your lands
Assist pilgrims travelling throug your lands
My dear brother, a group of holy pilgrims will soon enter your domain. I would charge you with escorting and assisting them until they reach the edge of your domain. \nWill you accept this duty?
The pilgrims approve of your course of action and you can hear them praising your wisdom
The pilgrims disapprove of your course of action and you can hear them muttering complaints against you
Wise pilgrims indeed
Ungrateful beggars
Some of the pilgrims have taken it upon themselves to avenge the crucifixion and have attacked several jewish communities. How will you react to this?
You will stop at once, we are all brothers in the Lord
Have the perpetrators punished
This looting seems fun
I think I should get a "loan" from these jews
A quarrel has erupted among the pilgrims about a debt. One party claims that it has been repayed but another says that they are still owed a large interest. What is your verdict?
I will pay the difference
The debt was extinguished, we don't tolerate usury
The interest should be payed in full
Pilgrims should be poor, give me the money
A group of bandits is attacking the pilgrim caravan, what will you do?
I will charge into the thick of battle
I will protect the supplies
I will protect the villagers
Maybe nobody will notice if I do a little pillaging as well
A terrible disease has begun to spread among the pilgrims and they cry out for your help. How dedicated are you to their health?
I will tend to them personally
I will have my men tend to them
We must leave the sick behind
Time for a little corpse looting
It appears that the pilgrims haven't brought enough supplies to last the trip and they are starting to starve. What aid can you give them?
I will supply them with enough food for all the journey
I will supply them with food up to my border
We can raid neighboring villages for food
They can have food...for a price
It appears that the pilgrims have started raiding neighboring villages to shore up their dwindling food supply. How will you react?
I will reimburse the villagers for the lost goods
I will have the raiders punished
I will have them pay for the stolen goods
I will sequester the goods for my own stores

The pilgrims seem overjoyed with the way you handled their issues. They've actually put together a monetary reward as an extra thanks for your service. They bid you farewell and you find your standing increased among your brothers in the Order.
The pilgrims seem satisfied with the way you handled their issues. They bid you farewell and you find your standing increased among your brothers in the Order.
The pilgrims seem offended with the way you handled their issues. They leave without so much as a goodbye and word of this soon reaches your brothers in the Order.
It was a pleasure
Thank God I have done my duty
Good riddance!
Train With a Fellow Knight
Train your Martial Skill
Improve your skill in battle with the assistance of a fellow knight
Improve your skill in battle by training with a fellow knight
My dear brother, I think we would both benefit by training our skill in arms together. \nWill you join me in the coming days?
You and [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] get ready to begin your training together. All that is left is to choose the weapon that you will use
A Sword is a noble weapon
A Lance is deadly on horseback
An Axe will be swift
A Mace will be decisive
You and [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] train for days and bit by bit you notice each other improving. You've both learned from each other and will remember this time fondly.
You and [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] train for days but you don't notice any improvements. You leave thinking that you could have better spent your time.
You and [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] train for days but all you get for it is a lot of bruises and ill advice. You expected a lot more from [quest_collaborator.GetBestName].
We should do this again sometime!
Some help he was
I bet he just wanted to hit me!
End a Rivalry for [quest_collaborator.GetBestName]
End a Rivalry for [quest_collaborator.GetBestName]
Help [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] to get rid of a tedious rivalry
Help free [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] from a problematic rivalry
My dear [Root.GetTitledName], I have been vexed by [rival_target.GetBestName] for too long. \nWill you help me end this rivalry?
There are several different ways in which you can end this rivalry. What is your approach?
Violence is the answer!
I will try and talk to them
Nothing a bit of cunning won't solve
You have decided to confront [rival_target.GetBestName] physically and make [rival_target.GetHerHim] leave [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] alone. What weakness will you focus on?
[rival_target.GetHerHisCap] shyness
[rival_target.GetHerHisCap] cowardice
[rival_target.GetHerHisCap] paranoia
[rival_target.GetHerHisCap] face
You have decided to confront [rival_target.GetBestName] diplomatically and make [rival_target.GetHerHim] leave [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] alone. How will you get them to drop their grudge?
Praise [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] to [rival_target.GetHerHim]
Flatter [rival_target.GetHerHim]
Appeal to [rival_target.GetHerHis] better nature
Try to find some common ground
You have decided to circumvent [rival_target.GetBestName] and make [rival_target.GetHerHim] leave [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] alone. What tactic will you employ?
Blackmail [rival_target.GetHerHim]
Bribe [rival_target.GetHerHim]
Convince [rival_target.GetHerHim] that [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] was slandered
Tell [rival_target.GetHerHim] that [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] has apologized

Your arguments prove convincing enough that [rival_target.GetBestName] agrees to end [rival_target.GetHerHis] feud with [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] and your companion thanks you profusely for your help.

Your arguments fail to convince [rival_target.GetBestName] to end [rival_target.GetHerHis] feud with [quest_collaborator.GetBestName]. [quest_collaborator.GetFirstName] looks disappointed at the failure of your attempts
It was nothing
[quest_collaborator.GetSheHeCap] should solve [quest_collaborator.GetHerHis] own damn problems
Help [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] escape from jail
Help [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] escape from jail
Help [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] escape from their captor and return to their court
Help free [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] from prison
It appears that [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] has been freed. As such, your assistance is no longer necessary.
Good for [quest_collaborator.GetHerHim]
My dear [Root.GetTitledName], I have been imprisoned by [quest_collaborator.Host.GetBestName] without the possibility to return to my home. \nWill you help me escape this foul place?
The first step in breaking [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] out of prison is choosing how to get in. Which strategy will you employ?
I will befriend one of the guards
I will bribe some servants
I will steal the plans to the prison and find a forgotten entrance
I will dig a tunnel in
Once in, you will need someone to guide you to [quest_collaborator.GetBestName]. You should make sure it's someone you can trust.
[escape_mole.GetBestName]
[escape_mole1.GetBestName]
[escape_mole2.GetBestName]
[escape_mole3.GetBestName]
The time for the escape has arrived. You get inside the prison, are guided to the jail cell and manage to free [quest_collaborator.GetBestName]. What is your strategy on the way out?
I will say I'm transferring [quest_collaborator.GetHerHim] to another prison
I can take out the guards
We can sneak past the guards

Everything worked out perfectly: the entry was flawless, the contact trustworthy and you managed to make a quick getaway. You can return home now, knowing that [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] will be forever grateful.

Your plan seemed to be perfect but something somewhere went wrong. One of the guards managed to catch up to you and give you a nasty wound before you got away. However, you are sure that [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] won't forget the risks you took for [quest_collaborator.GetHerHim].

Things have gone quite wrong with your plan. You're not sure what gave you away but the guards were upon you as soon as you reached [quest_collaborator.GetBestName]. You barely managed to get away with a few wounds but were forced to leave [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] behind.

Everything went wrong. You raised suspicions with your method of entry and your contact was only too eager to sell you out. You tried your best to get away with [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] but you were quickly overpowered. Now you also remain in the dungeon of [quest_collaborator.Host.GetBestName].
Fare well!
Damn...
Find an heirloom belonging to an ancestor of [quest_collaborator.GetBestName]
Find an heirloom of [quest_collaborator.GetBestName]
[quest_collaborator.GetBestName] has found evidence of an heirloom belonging to their ancestor and wants you to retreive it
Find [quest_collaborator.GetBestName]'s heirloom
My dear [Root.GetTitledName], I have recently obtained information that an ancient heirloom of my family is located somewhere around an ancient castle. \nWould you please lead the search?
The information given to you by [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] is still not enough to run an effective search. How will you find more information?
I will gather information from those who live in the area
I will search all the books I can find
I will steal information from [quest_collaborator.GetBestName]'s enemies
I will send my squire to gather information
The information you obtained has proved very useful and you find yourself on the right path. However, you notice a hungry looking beast standing in your way.
You haven't been able to obtain any meaningful information so you head out into the forest to search for clues. While you are so occupied, you notice a fierce beast making its way towards you.
I will attack the creature
I will send my squire to weaken it for me
I will hide and avoid the beast

You manage to get past the monster and be on your way. After a few hours of travel, you come upon a ruin with crumbled indications that you have indeed found the right place. But where is the artifact kept?

You barely manage to escape from the monster and proceed into the woods with several cuts and bruises. After a few hours of travel, you come upon a ruined old building that seems to be what you seek. But where is the artifact kept?
I will take down every wall I can find
I will look for guidance in the symbolism of the place
I will study the architecture for hidden chambers

You triumphantly enter the dark crypt and notice the telltale glint of gold. You manage to find an ancient ring with the initials of [quest_collaborator.GetBestName]'s ancestor and some extra loot for your trouble.
You enter the dark crypt and notice a glint of precious metal in the dirt. Scraping it away, you manage to find an ancient ring with the initials of [quest_collaborator.GetBestName]'s ancestor!
You have been looking for a couple of days now and you can't find anything. Maybe you can't find the artifact or you went to the wrong place. [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] will not be pleased.

You have been looking for a couple of days now in terrible weather and you can't find anything. Maybe you can't find the artifact or you went to the wrong place. [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] will not be pleased and you're not feeling too good either.
Another job well done
This was not worth my time
Train in Etiquette and Socialization
Train your Diplomatic Skills
Improve your skill in court with the assistance of a close associate
Improve your social skills by training with a close associate
My dear [Root.GetTitledName], I think we would both benefit by training our social skills together. \nWill you join me in the coming days?
Now that you are in [quest_collaborator.GetBestName]'s company, it is time to decide which aspect of etiquette or socialization you will focus on.
The art of polite conversation
The knightly virtue of charity
The greatest good of justice
How to be the life of any party
The days of practice with [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] soon provide their fruits and you can overhear courtiers commenting on your newfound skills.
The days of practice with [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] are pleasant enough but you soon feel that you don't have much to learn from each other.
The days of practice with [quest_collaborator.GetBestName] seem to provide their fruits but you have started to overhear fellow knights commenting on your newfound vices.
Thank you [quest_collaborator.GetBestName]
Until next time!
I don't care for their opinions
A New Order

[From.GetTitledName] has founded an order of holy knights to fight for the rights of the weak and chastise the wicked. Nobles from all over their domain are flocking to join this new society and it shall be called the "Order of the Star". Do you wish to be the only one to nominate knights or can those so inclined join?
Anyone can join!
I am the only one who can choose!
Interesting...
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Star with the rank of Commander. Will you accept?
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Star with the rank of Officer. Will you accept?
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Star with the rank of Knight. Will you accept?
Certainly!
I don't think I will

[From.GetTitledName] has founded an order of holy knights to fight for the rights of the weak and chastise the wicked. Nobles from all over their domain are flocking to join this new society. It shall be called the "Order of the Dragon".
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Dragon with the rank of Commander. Will you accept?
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Dragon with the rank of Officer. Will you accept?
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Dragon with the rank of Knight. Will you accept?

[From.GetTitledName] has founded an order of holy knights to fight for the rights of the weak and chastise the wicked. Nobles from all over their domain are flocking to join this new society. It shall be called the "Order of Saint George".
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of Saint George with the rank of Commander. Will you accept?
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of Saint George with the rank of Officer. Will you accept?
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of Saint George with the rank of Knight. Will you accept?

[From.GetTitledName] has founded an order of holy knights to fight for the rights of the weak and chastise the wicked. Nobles from all over their domain are flocking to join this new society. It shall be called the "Order of the Garter".
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Garter with the rank of Commander. Will you accept?
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Garter with the rank of Officer. Will you accept?
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Garter with the rank of Knight. Will you accept?

[From.GetTitledName] has founded an order of holy knights to fight for the rights of the weak and chastise the wicked. Nobles from all over their domain are flocking to join this new society. It shall be called the "Order of the Golden Fleece".
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Golden Fleece with the rank of Commander. Will you accept?
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Golden Fleece with the rank of Officer. Will you accept?
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Golden Fleece with the rank of Knight. Will you accept?

[From.GetTitledName] has founded an order of holy knights to fight for the rights of the weak and chastise the wicked. Nobles from all over their domain are flocking to join this new society. It shall be called the "Order of the Thistle".
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Thistle with the rank of Commander. Will you accept?
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Thistle with the rank of Officer. Will you accept?
[From.GetTitledName] has invited you to join their new Order of the Thistle with the rank of Knight. Will you accept?
Your men point you to a young soldier, they say that he still needs some training but that he will make a fine squire.
You start tomorrow
I'll look elsewhere
Your men point you to an orphan boy, he has lived alone most his life and has learnt to fend for himself. Despite the lack of military training, he will make a fine squire.
Your men point you to the son of a minor noble, his parents wish to advance his status by serving with you. Despite the lack of military training, he will make a fine squire.

Your men point you to a travelling monk, he has chosen to leave his monastery to help the weak from oppression. Despite the lack of military training, his enthusiasm may yet turn him into a great warrior.

Your men point you to the son of a minor noble, he has been inspired by tales of bravery and chivalry and wishes to join you. Despite the lack of military training, his enthusiasm may yet turn him into a great warrior.
Your men point you to an experienced officer, he has fought in your armies for several years and now wishes to elevate himself. His experience and skill will be useful assets as a squire.
Your men point you to a big dubious-looking man, he is known all over the region as a consummate killer. His character may be a bit unstable but you can't argue with his kill count.
Close to your home you find a farmer, an honest man but with very little wit in him. You promise him posession of an island and he gladly leaves his wife and children to be your squire.
Your men point you to an unremarkable ferllow, apparently he has an incredible innate talent. If you will be able to curb his pride, he will make an amazing squire.

After many years of service, the time has finally come for you to knight your squire. They kneel as a servant and rise as your brother. You embrace before [From.GetHeShe] leaves to seek out glory of their own.
I will never forget you!
Your old squire [From.GetFirstName] returns to you one day bringing a gift: it is an ancient sword they found in their travels, they gift it to you in memory of old times.
Tell me all about your journey.
Your squire has gotten themself challenged to a duel. They don't want to share the details but says that they need your help to train for it.
Alright, let's get sparring
Don't get dragged into duels, you fool!
I'm sure you can handle it
Let's get down to business
Your squire comes up to you asking for your help: he's left a girl pregnant and she just bore him a bastard. He seems very nervous about the whole affair.
You must raise the child as your own
Alright, I'll make sure it disappears
You should take your own decisions!
I will make the girl a lady at court
Your squire looks embarassed as they come to your presence. It appears they are in love with a [From.GetBoyGirlOpp] and doesn't quite know how to go about it.
Let me teach you a thing or two
They're wasted on a mere squire! They will be mine
Wait until marriage for such things
I will teach you how to sway hearts
You hear from reputable sources that your squire has been turning to sins of gambling and the flesh.
This is no way to act
Those sound like good sins
They must face their own temptations
I will give them a good long lecture
Your squire runs up to you looking quite worried. Apparently they have offended a local lord and fears the consequences for themself.
I will talk with the lord
How dare you insult your betters!
You must face the consequences of your actions
Let me explain how etiquette works
Your squire has been looking rough recently and finally opens up to you. They no longer wish to continue this profession but prefers to retire
Please stay, [From.GetFirstName]
[From.GetFirstName] will reconsider their decision
I will make you regret it if you leave
[From.GetFirstName] is likely to stay but will resent you
Go, if that makes you happy
Please remember all the good times we had!
[From.GetFirstName] is likely to stay
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] goes back on their decision and decides to remain in your service.
Good [FromFrom.GetLadLass]
Your squire is immovable and leaves your service the very next day.
Damn...
You hear from reputable sources that your squire has been frequenting people of a disreputable nature.
Promise me that you won't see them again
I would love to meet these friends
Let them have their fun
Do not go against the will of God
You've noticed your squire holding some rather unorthodox views about God and the Church. Some may even say they are heretical...
Come back to the Church
Dear God, you're right!
I will not question their faith
Let us read the Bible together
Your squire appears to be very clumsy in some aspects of knightly preparation. Maybe you should take some time to educate him better.
I will teach you how to speak
I will teach you how to fight
I will teach you about God
I think you're doing fine
You are known as a great knight and it is important that you pass on your skills to your faithful squire.
I will explain my rethoric
I will reveal my fighting secrets
I will share my knowledge
You don't need my help
Training countless hours with your squire has made you appreciate them more than you expected. Maybe this could turn into a friendship.
What do you say, [From.GetFirstName]?
I might show you my bedchamber
I mean, he's ok

Your relationship with your squire has become more and more strained in recent times and now he finally snapped. He no longer wants to be your servant and hopes that the world will soon be rid of you.
How could you [From.GetFirstName]?
Only one of us will leave unscathed!
You receive troubling reports that your squire has abused their authority and has looted several small villages. The peasants are clamoring for you to react.
I will pay back the damages done
[From.GetFirstName] will be delivered unarmed to the villagers
[From.GetFirstName] might not make it out alive
Boys will be boys
What a splendid idea [From.GetFirstName]!
You have come to realise that your sins have been getting out of hand and you can no longer continue this way. How will you try to defeat this scourge?
I will cut down slowly
I will stop straight away
I will consult the scriptures
I must accept my limits and work past them
Mild Success
Great Success
Mild Failure
Severe Failure
Your attempts have been successful. You have managed to confront and defeat your sin.
God be praised!
Your attempts have been unsuccessful. You have failed to defeat your sin but there is still hope you may win one day.
I must keep going
Your have been more successful than you would ever have hoped. You have not only managed to defeat your sin but now have accepted the virtue that was hidden from you.
God be praised!
Your attempts have been unsuccessful. You have failed to defeat your sin and now the world looks bleaker than ever for it.
What's the point?
As an anointed knight, it is only fitting that you have a great steed. But what kind of horse are you looking for?
A beautiful animal to impress the court
A great warhorse to chase down my enemies
Only the most handsome of horses will do!
Only the most bellicose horse will do!
After long years of loyal service, your faithful steed has galloped his last.
I'll find another to serve me just as well
Oh cruel fate!
Everything I care about dies...
During your adventures, you notice in the distance thirty or fourty giants waving their long arms. Surely you will be blessed for removing such foul creatures from the earth!
Charge!

During your adventures, you come across a small village with a certain commotion going on. The beautiful woman amongst them must be a princess captured by bandits! You fight your way through but the peasants beat you and say you ruined their wedding
Wedding?
The Grand Tournament
You have sent letters to invite all your brothers in the Order.
It will be glorious
Grandmaster [From.GetFirstName] has called you to participate in a Grand Tournament celebrating the martial skill of your Order.
A chance to prove my talent!
I will greatly enjoy spectating
I will not be attending
My health will not allow me to attend
The day of the tournament approaches, will you take the field?
A chance to prove my talent!
I will greatly enjoy spectating
I will show them what a woman can do!
The Grand Tournament is over and its jousts will be talked about for years to come.
Glorious memories all!
Your brother [From.GetTitledName] has died tragically in your tournament.
A stain on this day
These things happen
Your brother [From.GetTitledName] has been tragically maimed in your tournament.
Your brother [From.GetTitledName] has been tragically injured in your tournament.
All this hitting each other with sharp objects has made you realize that you'd much rather have someone else fight for you.
Get that thing away from me!
The displays of valor in front of you have spurred you to aim for greater feats of bravery.
For glory!
The Great Toournament has allowed you to increase your martial skills far beyond your youthful education.
They didn't teach this back at home!
The Great Toournament has shown that your martial skills are really very rusty and you aren't able to fight like you used to.
Oh the shame!
As you're walking through the tournament ground you notice some scantly clad ladies offering a different kind of entertainment.
I like the sound of that
Oh the times we live in!
Actually, that stable boy isn't half bad
Among the stalls in the tournament ground you notice a magician conjuring a dove from thin air. He appears to be very popular with the crowd.
Silly tricks for peasants
We shouldn't be promoting witchcraft!
I'll show a trick or two of my own
Among the stalls in the tournament ground you notice a wrinkled old woman dispensing herbal remedies in exchange for a few coins.
The people are always credulous
Guards, arrest this witch!
There's no harm in trying them
Seeing all these muscular men exercising their bodies and tuning them to perfection has made you reconsider your tastes.
Oh my!
After enjoying some of the more sensual attractions of the torunament, you begin to notice that all is not well south of the waist.
Well this is embarassing...
In your days at the tournament you've been sampling more and more drinks to the point that now you stumble around the field looking for the next pint.
Jush one mehr drink
Being surrounded by so many talented soldiers has allowed you to learn several useful tricks. You can now confidentely boast of your dueling ability
Now I am the master
Being a woman in such a military contest has attracted many poorly concealed comments and jokes towards you. It's starting to get on your nerves...
I will stab anyone else who comments
I'll show them in the competition
Returning to your tent, you notice a merchant being robbed. One of the robbers sees you and offers to split the money with you if you keep quiet
Get back you barbarians!
Nothing to see here...
Among the stalls of the tournament grounds, you notice several people gambling and the table closest to you has just lost a player.
I'm feeling lucky

Lady luck is with you today, you manage to accumulate some sizable winnings.

One of the merchants in the tournament grounds is selling some holy relics. They are quite expensive but they look quite good
This is a bargain!
I don't trust him

You return to your tent and show your new relic to some friends. Problems arise when one of them says they also bought the head of John the Baptist from the same merchant and a two headed saint is a very rare thing.

You confront the salesman and he pales at the realization. He begs you to take a part of his profits if you won't say anything to the customers.

I'll take your generous donation
You ready yourself for the joust and recognize your opponent. The crowd murmurs in anticipation as you both mount your steeds...
Prepare yourself [opponent_knight.GetTitle] [opponent_knight.GetFirstName]!
You manage to win the round but become injured in the process. You must decide if you feel able to face another fight.
You are defeated in this round and become injured as a consequence of your unhorsing. The tournament ends here for you.

You are defeated in this round and become badly injured as a consequence of your unhorsing. The tournament ends here for you.
You are defeated in this round and become badly injured as a consequence of your unhorsing. Despite this, you still have a chance to arrive third. Are you able to face another fight?
As you ride towards your opponent you see their lance pointing too far up and panic overtakes you as you see it speed towards your face.

You are defeated in this round, the tournament ends here for you.
You are defeated in this round but you still have a chance to arrive third.
I can still do this!

You manage to win the round and ride triumphantly around the courtiard.

After the joust you obtain a certain respect and admiration for [opponent_knight.GetTitle] [opponent_knight.GetFirstName], you wouldn't mind seeing a lot more of them.

After the joust you find yourself outraged and disgusted with [opponent_knight.GetTitle] [opponent_knight.GetFirstName], you won't be associating with them any time soon.

Oh happy day!

I see

A good result!

I see

Your Order is abuzz with the news that has just come in. A most holy artifact is rumored to be in the grandmaster's lands. Every knight worthy of that name is preparing for the adventure ahead.

Your squire claims to have seen where most of the other knights are headed. He urges you to follow them to get to the artifact.

Your squire claims to have read of the whereabouts of the artifact. It was a while ago but time is of the essence.

You have noticed that some fellow knights have taken to reading dusty old tomes to find information about the whereabouts of the artifact.
Quick! To the oldest library you can find!

One of your fellow knights rides on with purpose clutching an old piece of parchment that appears to contain a map. Now they are asleep and the map is just out of their guard...
I'll take that!

As you wander in search of the artifact, a ferocious beast takes you by surprise. You have mere moments to collect yourself before it charges.

Run away!
As you wander in search of the artifact, you come across a small party of bandits blocking the way through. How will you proceed?
Come at me, bretheren!
Run away!
I'm sure I can sneak around

During your search, you encounter an old fisherman who offers you lodging. Once you reach his castle, he reveals himslf to be a weak and bedridden king and provides you with a grand feast. Before the feast begins, you witness a procession with a fair damsel carrying a wide plate, a handsome knight carrying a lance and one more champion carrying a glowing chalice.
How strange...
What is their purpose? Who do they serve?

After long and gruelling travels, you come upon a small abandoned monastery that all the clues have pointed to. As you enter, you notice that it is covered in symbols and one very prominent riddle. You have one chance to prove yourself and find the artifact, how will that be?
You succeed in finding the artifact
You fail to find the artifact
I will solve the riddle
I will tear this place apart
I will study the symbols
You remove a well placed stone in the ruins and finally you see it! All this work has finally come to fruition!
It's beautiful!

You've looked everywhere but you can't see anything. Could all the evidence have been wrong? You look for any possible hiding place but there are none left to find. You leave this place wretched and wondering if maybe some higher power hid the artifact from you.
Noooooooo!

You have looked across the land for clues and guides but none of them have taken you in the right direction, it's finally time to give up the quest. Maybe someone else will have more luck in finding this mythical artifact.

As your host brings out another course of mouth-watering food, you make some remarks to [discussion_knight.GetBestName] that make you think about the nature of generosity. Should you hand out your wealth to friends or is it just a way to attract leeches?

The days you have spent in the company of your fellow knights have really given you an insight on the diplomatic arts. As such, your skills have increased far beyond what your educators had taught you.

The days you have spent in the company of your fellow knights have made you realize how unskilled you really are in the diplomatic arts. As such, your skills have decreased even below what your educators had taught you.
